item.title: Help me how chnage the drop chance
item.dc:creator: @Wattzzz Wattzzz
item.description:
@Wattzzz wrote:

If you put your NPC’s drops into item2

than you will have 100% of an item drop

It’s liek in real runescape

every NPC drops anything …

if your Item ID is into that Item2 list

you wil have 100% chance to have a drop!

Grtzz Wattzz[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 18, 2008, 10:50:48 AM[/size][hr]BTW.

Do you use MtScape Source/Slipknotscape based ?

Wel thats mine i fixed some bugs ect maybe helpfull for you if ya want heres link

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Thx!

item.title: Help me how chnage the drop chance
item.dc:creator: @Wattzzz Wattzzz
item.description:
@Wattzzz wrote:

Every item you add

Like Bones… if you added like 20 times to one NPC you wil have allot of bones
and no Stuff

If ya delete all Bones you wil have More usefull stuff …

To Change ??

go to Item2

Than go down (doesnt mather)

U wil see somthing looks like this

public static int bandosmonster[] = {15334,15185,15345,15346,15347,15348,15349,15350,15351}; public static int randombandosmonster() { return bandosmonster[(int)(Math.random()*bandosmonster.length)]; } }

When you look to the ID of your NPC search it into file

Than Delete all bones ID’s or whatever so you sould see something like this

public static int bandosmonster[] = {15334}; public static int randombandosmonster() { return bandosmonster[(int)(Math.random()*bandosmonster.length)]; } }

Deleted al orther code id’s Just to show you an example …

[ul][li][/li][/ul]

[ul][li][/li][/ul]
